Displays the coordinates of the nearest biome specified and teleports players to it.

== Syntax ==
<code>/tptobiome <victim: target> <biome: biomes></code>

<code>/tpb <victim: target> <biome: biomes></code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|victim: player|CommandSelector<Player>}}

Specifies the player(s) to be teleported.

{{Argument|be=1|biome: biomes|Enum}}

The biome to teleport to.
